entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023
